price: ߊ߲ ߞߵߏ ߢߐ߲߰ ߜߘߍ߫ ߘߊ߲߫ ߡߊ߬ߘߏ߬ߣߌ߲߬ߝߋ߲ ߘߌ߫ ߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߦߋ߫
arabic: وَخَلَقۡنَا لَهُم مِّن مِّثۡلِهِۦ مَا يَرۡكَبُونَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: wakhalaqnā lahum min mith'lihi mā yarkabūna
